net.alomax.freq

Interface FrequencyDomainProcess


  • public interface FrequencyDomainProcess
    An interface representing processes that acts on frequency domain, complex arrays.
    See Also:
    Cmplx

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cmplx[] apply(double dt, Cmplx[] cx)
      Does processing in the frequency domain.
      void checkSettings()
      Checks process parameters
      float[] postProcess(double dt, float[] x)
      Does post-processing on the time-domain data.
      float[] preProcess(double dt, float[] x)
      Does pre-processing on the time-domain data.
      boolean sampleChangedInPostProcess()
      Returns true if post-processing on the time-domain data changes samples.
      boolean sampleChangedInPreProcess()
      Returns true if pre-processing on the time-domain data changes samples.
      void updateFields(TimeSeries timeSeries)
      Update fields in TimeSeries object.

    • Method Detail

      • preProcess

        float[] preProcess(double dt,
                   float[] x)
        Does pre-processing on the time-domain data.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time-domain sampling interval in seconds.
        x - the array of float values to be processed.
        Returns:
        the processed float values.

      • postProcess

        float[] postProcess(double dt,
                    float[] x)
        Does post-processing on the time-domain data.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time-domain sampling interval in seconds.
        x - the array of float values to be processed.
        Returns:
        the processed float values.

      • sampleChangedInPreProcess

        boolean sampleChangedInPreProcess()
        Returns true if pre-processing on the time-domain data changes samples.
        Returns:
        true if post-processing on the time-domain data changes samples, false otherwise.

      • sampleChangedInPostProcess

        boolean sampleChangedInPostProcess()
        Returns true if post-processing on the time-domain data changes samples.
        Returns:
        true if post-processing on the time-domain data changes samples, false otherwise.

      • apply

        Cmplx[] apply(double dt,
              Cmplx[] cx)
        Does processing in the frequency domain.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time-domain sampling interval in seconds.
        cx - the array of complex values to be processed.
        Returns:
        a new array of processed complex vaulues.

      • updateFields

        void updateFields(TimeSeries timeSeries)
        Update fields in TimeSeries object.
        Parameters:
        timeSeries - the TimeSeries object.

      • checkSettings

        void checkSettings()
            throws FreqException
        Checks process parameters
        Throws:
        FreqException - if a setting is invalid.
